title: Get started with Twilio WhatsApp API in Python
content: If you're looking to build a WhatsApp chatbot that handles messages, replies, and statuses automatically, Twilio's WhatsApp API is the perfect choice. In this article, the author provides a step-by-step guide on how to get started with Twilio WhatsApp in Python. The process is broken down into easy-to-follow steps, and there's even a helpful video tutorial included. The article also mentions that if you want to create a full-fledged WhatsApp chatbot, you can contact the author via Telegram. Additionally, there are resources provided such as downloading the latest version of Python and Python packages, as well as subscribing to the Code Jana YouTube channel for more useful content.
